subject: Soccer
Bribery and Kickbacks
Frauds and Swindling
Money Laundering
lead_paragraph: Alfredo Hawit of Honduras, who was president of Concacaf and a vice president of FIFA, pleaded not guilty to charges including wire fraud, money laundering and racketeering conspiracy.
snippet: Alfredo Hawit of Honduras, who was president of Concacaf and a vice president of FIFA, pleaded not guilty to charges including wire fraud, money laundering and racketeering conspiracy.
